title: Quicksilver elemental
data:

|   |                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A mercurial spirit drawn from the elemental plane of earth. It exists in this world by inhabiting a shimmering body of liquid metal. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Quicksilver elementals** are antimagic menaces found in the [Iron City of Dis](/Iron_City_of_Dis "Iron City of Dis"). Their combination of status effect-dispelling bolts, immunity to most elements, and MP-draining attacks make them particularly lethal to casters. They tend to move in erratic patterns.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                               |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Quicksilver Bolt](/Quicksilver_Bolt "Quicksilver Bolt") (3d20) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Noisy flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Players should be particularly cautious around this creature. Getting hit with their bolts will unravel most enchantments, including useful buffs such as [haste](/Haste "Haste") or [might](/Might "Might"). Also, they can dispel your Tele status, preventing you from [teleporting](/Teleport "Teleport") away.
- Casters should avoid being hit in melee, as a single attack can easily take out a large portion of their MP bar.

## History

- Quicksilver elementals were added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").

Quicksilver elemental

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
quicksilver elemental E 
HP 52-107
HD 16
XP 1245
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 20
Will Immune
Attack1 30 (hit: antimagic)


Resistances rF+++
rC+++
rElec+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type elemental, quicksilver elemental
Flags See invisible
Batty
Unbreathing
Unblindable
A mercurial spirit drawn from the elemental plane of earth. It exists in this world by inhabiting a shimmering body of liquid metal.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Quicksilver elementals are antimagic menaces found in the Iron City of Dis. Their combination of status effect-dispelling bolts, immunity to most elements, and MP-draining attacks make them particularly lethal to casters. They tend to move in erratic patterns.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Quicksilver Bolt (3d20) Natural flag,
Breath flag,
Noisy flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Players should be particularly cautious around this creature. Getting hit with their bolts will unravel most enchantments, including useful buffs such as haste or might. Also, they can dispel your Tele status, preventing you from teleporting away.
  • Casters should avoid being hit in melee, as a single attack can easily take out a large portion of their MP bar.

History

  • Quicksilver elementals were added in 0.28.
